Actions.Text: REPORTED AND COMMITTED TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Relates to food safety and quality date labelling requirements
Summary: Requires certain labelling to be used to indicate the safety dates and quality dates of food items; requires the department of agriculture and markets to educate consumers about such provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง214-p, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to food safety and quality date labelling requirements
